Package dataset

Interface Instance

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultInstance
public interface Instance
An Instance is a collection of values (int), each one associated to an Attribute, plus a value for the class (int)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Attribute[] getAttributes()
    Get an array with all the attributes of the instance
    int getAttValue​(Attribute a)
    Return the value of an attribute in the instance
    int getClassValue()
    Return the class value of this instance
    boolean hasAttributes​(Attribute[] attributes)
    Check if the Instance has a set of attributes
    void removeAttribute​(Attribute a)
    Remove an attribute from the instance
    boolean setAttValue​(Attribute a, int v)
    Set a value for an attribute (greater or equal to 0)
    boolean setClassValue​(int c)
    Set the value of the class of this instance (greater or equal to 0)

  • Method Details

    • setClassValue

      boolean setClassValue​(int c)
      Set the value of the class of this instance (greater or equal to 0)
      Parameters:
      c - class value
      Returns:
      true if successful, else false

    • getClassValue

      int getClassValue()
      Return the class value of this instance
      Returns:
      class value or -1 if it has no class value

    • setAttValue

      boolean setAttValue​(Attribute a, int v)
      Set a value for an attribute (greater or equal to 0)
      Parameters:
      a - Attribute
      v - Attribute value
      Returns:
      true if successful, else false

    • getAttValue

      int getAttValue​(Attribute a)
      Return the value of an attribute in the instance
      Parameters:
      a - Attribute to return the value of
      Returns:
      the attribute value, or -1 if unsuccessful

    • removeAttribute

      void removeAttribute​(Attribute a)
      Remove an attribute from the instance
      Parameters:
      a - Attribute to remove

    • getAttributes

      Attribute[] getAttributes()
      Get an array with all the attributes of the instance
      Returns:
      array with all of the attributes of the instance

    • hasAttributes

      boolean hasAttributes​(Attribute[] attributes)
      Check if the Instance has a set of attributes
      Parameters:
      attributes - Array of attributes to check
      Returns:
      true if it has all the attributes, else false
